entry.def: An astringent is a liquid that you put on your skin to make it less oily or to make cuts stop bleeding.

example.ex: Sunset Boulevard was originally conceived by Wilder as an astringent satire on Hollywood.
example.tran: 怀尔德最初是想把《日落大道》拍成一部对好莱坞的辛辣讽刺片。

entry.def: If something has an astringent taste, it is sharp or bitter.

example.ex: The fruit has a tart and astringent flavour.

means.word_mean: 1. a sharp astringent taste; the taste experience when a substance causes the mouth to pucker
2. the ability to contract or draw together soft body tissues to check blood flow or restrict secretion of fluids

auth_sentence.content: There are a couple others in here that have what I call a mouth-coating astringency, and they just stick to your tongue.
